description: This header file declares internal function prototypes for the Slap Obj Record object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It provides function signatures related to reference counting, access control, and matching operations for internal use in the implementation.

methods.name: SlapOroGetRef
methods.description: Retrieves the current reference count for the object.

methods.name: SlapOroIncRef
methods.description: Increments the reference count for the object.

methods.name: SlapOroDecRef
methods.description: Decrements the reference count for the object.

methods.name: SlapOroAcqAccess
methods.description: Acquires access to the object, likely for thread safety.

methods.name: SlapOroMatch1
methods.description: Checks if the object matches a given container and instance ID.

methods.name: SlapOroMatch2
methods.description: Checks if the object matches a given container and service component.
